  16. (* Description of ocamltest's command-line options *)

  18. ‌let show_objects title string_of_object objects =
  19.   let print_object o = print_endline ("  " ^ (string_of_object o)) in
  20.   print_endline title;
  21.   List.iter print_object objects;
  22.   exit 0

  24. ‌let string_of_action a =
  25.   Printf.sprintf "%s: %s" (Actions.name a) (Actions.description a)

  27. ‌let string_of_test test =
  28.   if test.Tests.test_run_by_default then
  29.     test.Tests.test_name ^ " (run by default): " ^ test.Tests.test_description
  30.   else
  31.     test.Tests.test_name ^ ": " ^ test.Tests.test_description

  33. ‌let string_of_variable v =
  34.   Printf.sprintf "%s: %s"
  35.     (Variables.name_of_variable v)
  36.     (Variables.description_of_variable v)

  38. ‌let show_actions () =
  39.   let actions = Actions.get_registered_actions () in
  40.   show_objects "Available actions are:" string_of_action actions

  42. ‌let show_tests () =
  43.   let tests = Tests.get_registered_tests () in
  44.   show_objects "Available tests are:" string_of_test tests

  46. ‌let show_variables () =
  47.   let variables = Variables.get_registered_variables () in
  48.   show_objects "Available variables are:" string_of_variable variables

  50. ‌let log_to_stderr = ref false

  52. ‌let promote = ref false

  54. ‌let default_timeout = ref 0

  56. ‌let keep_test_dir_on_success = ref false

  58. ‌let find_test_dirs = ref []

  60. ‌let list_tests = ref []

  62. ‌let show_timings = ref false

  64. ‌let add_to_list r x =
  65.   r := !r @ [x]

  67. ‌let commandline_options =
  68. [
  69.   ("-e", Arg.Set log_to_stderr, " Log to stderr instead of a file.");
  70.   ("-promote", Arg.Set promote,
  71.    " Overwrite reference files with the test output (experimental, unstable)");
  72.   ("-show-actions", Arg.Unit show_actions, " Show available actions.");
  73.   ("-show-tests", Arg.Unit show_tests, " Show available tests.");
  74.   ("-show-variables", Arg.Unit show_variables, " Show available variables.");
  75.   ("-show-timings", Arg.Set show_timings,
  76.    " Show the wall clock time taken for each test file.");
  77.   ("-timeout",
  78.      Arg.Int (fun t -> if t >= 0
  79.                        then default_timeout := t
  80.                        else raise (Arg.Bad "negative timeout")),
  81.      "<seconds> Set maximal execution time for every command (in seconds)");
  82.   ("-find-test-dirs", Arg.String (add_to_list find_test_dirs),
  83.    " Find directories that contain tests (recursive).");
  84.   ("-list-tests", Arg.String (add_to_list list_tests),
  85.    " List tests in given directory.");
  86.   ("-keep-test-dir-on-success", Arg.Set keep_test_dir_on_success,
  87.    " Keep the test directory (with the generated test artefacts) on success.");
  88. ]

  90. ‌let files_to_test = ref []

  92. ‌let usage = "Usage: " ^ Sys.argv.(0) ^ " options files to test"

  94. let () =
  95.   Arg.parse (Arg.align commandline_options) (add_to_list files_to_test) usage

  97. ‌let log_to_stderr = !log_to_stderr
  98. ‌let files_to_test = !files_to_test
  99. ‌let promote = !promote
  100. ‌let default_timeout = !default_timeout
  101. ‌let find_test_dirs = !find_test_dirs
  102. ‌let list_tests = !list_tests
  103. ‌let keep_test_dir_on_success = !keep_test_dir_on_success
  104. ‌let show_timings = !show_timings
